price: (52) Rather, every person among them desires that he[1797] would be given scriptures spread about.[1798]
arabic: بَلۡ يُرِيدُ كُلُّ ٱمۡرِيٕٖ مِّنۡهُمۡ أَن يُؤۡتَىٰ صُحُفٗا مُّنَشَّرَةٗ
footnotes:
[1797]- Instead of Muḥammad (ﷺ).
[1798]- i.e., made public.  Much of their refusal of his message was due to envy and jealousy of the Prophet (ﷺ).

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: bal yurīdu kullu im'ri-in min'hum an yu'tā ṣuḥufan munasharatan
